Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory720.jpg'}
{3: 'Mission accomplished and trial session successfully concluded. We look forward to seeing you next time...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory234.png'}
{3: 'With the robotic voice signaling the end, the white light grows stronger and the surroundings slowly dissipate, reverting back to the original room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'We did it—wait...? What?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Wh-what's going on? How are we back here already?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Because that's the whole story.", 3: '17'}
{3: "Seated, you casually show Pulao the little booklet you just snagged from the chair's crevice."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: '"That\'s the whole story." What\'s that supposed to mean? And what is this thing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Confused, Pulao steps closer and takes the booklet from you.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Kowloong's newest virtual reality system, engineered to transport you into a preset virtual world. Simply sit on the device to activate...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Ah, so that whole adventure wasn't really us stepping into the novel's world, just a simulation crafted by this device?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao pouts, clearly disappointed.'}
{2: "Gently rub Pulao's head", 3: '26', 4: "Lightly tap Pulao's forehead", 5: '26'}
{2: 'It was still a pretty unique experience, at least.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Not to mention...', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Your intention to protect everyone, that part was real.', 3: '31'}
{3: 'Pulao frowns, her pout softening reluctantly.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Well, that's one way to put it, and it's not wrong...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Exactly, magic or no magic, Immortal Pulao is still Immortal Pulao.', 3: '36'}
{3: 'You turn to Pulao, who still looks slightly upset, and awkwardly imitate some gestures you saw from the scene earlier.'}
{2: 'Thanks for stepping in, Great Immortal!', 3: '38'}
{3: 'Pulao sheepishly scratches her head, her usual grin returning.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "I don't need to be some legendary immortal—just being able to protect the ones I love is enough. It doesn't matter if I'm an immortal or just a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You see, those immortals in the books? They're so powerful that enemies won't even dare to blink the wrong way at them. Honestly, I get a little jealous.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Even the greatest immortals didn't become legends overnight.", 3: '46'}
{2: 'But with enough practice, even without any real magic, You can wield that kind of power too.', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "...Yeah! That's right, Commandant! I am Pulao after all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Whether in reality or in dreams, I won't stop pushing ahead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'There\'s an old saying in Kowloong: "Constant dripping wears away the stone."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Mark my words, the legend of the Great Immortal Pulao will make a comeback one day!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The pages of the novel on the table dance briefly in the breeze before settling on the final page where the author's note lies."}
{3: '"Maybe everyone from Kowloong secretly harbors a dream of immortal cultivation."'}
{3: '"Here\'s hoping that every reader of this book carries with them the dream of a world where they can be the hero, bringing peace and salvation to all."'}
